metadata.title: CVE-2020-36138 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in decode_frame in libavcodec/tiff.c in FFmpegversion 4.3, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS).

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
